<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4642</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">You Be the Judge</string>
            <string language="es">Tú serás el juez</string>
            <string language="ga">Is Tusa an Breitheamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie sind der Richter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous soyez le juge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você seja o juiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Siete il giudice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είστε ο δικαστής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plan for an oral French activity encouraging the use of spoken French by setting up a trial of Little Red Riding Hood.</string>
            <string language="es">Plan de lección para una actividad oral en francés que estimula a usar el francés hablado estableciendo un juzgado de Caperucita Roja.</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean ceachta do ghníomhaíocht béil Fraincise a spreagann úsáid Fraincise béil trí thriail den Chochailín Dearg a eagrú.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">French</string>
            <string language="es">Francés</string>
            <string language="ga">Fraincis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speaking</string>
            <string language="es">Idioma hablado. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Labhairt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan für eine französische 
mündlichaktivität, die den Gebrauch von gesprochenen Franzosen 
anregt, durch einen Versuch Rotkäppchens aufstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de leçon pour une activité française orale
encourageant l'utilisation du français parlé en installant une 
épreuve de peu de capot d'équitation rouge.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta da lição para uma atividade francesa oral
que incentiva o uso do francês falado ajustando acima uma 
experimentação de pouca capa de equitação vermelha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di lezione per un'attività francese 
orale che consiglia all'uso del francese parlato installando una prova
di poco cappuccio di riding rosso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια προφορική γαλλική 
δραστηριότητα που ενθαρρύνει τη χρήση των προφορικών γαλλικών με 
την οργάνωση μιας δοκιμής λίγης κόκκινης οδηγώντας κουκούλας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Französisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprechen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Français</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Francês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Discurso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Francese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parlare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
